name: Neon Retroid
description:
You are controlling a Ball... a neon ball....

In a comic world ... go as fast as you want.. get boost and avoid those obstacles...

Your distance is your score....

Font : from Internet [as far as I can tell .. free to use]

Music : Me 

Game : Me 

Art : also Me

This game was actually made for learning purpose...if you are interested..just download the project file to look inside ....
